ccg-setinfo.cards: <card name="The Balrog" graphics="TheBalrog.jpg" text="Unique. Manifestation of Balrog of Moria. Discard all other manifestations of Balrog of Moria when this card comes into play. +3 to the roll for his company to move between adjacent Under-deeps sites. The Balrog's prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike.
